amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 118-298 to make technical corrections to fix citations and adjust punctuation and clarifies language on gifts, enforcement, and the Government Accountability Office Study.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Foxx amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
